theory: Nero might still be alive despite being thrown into the Aqua Laguna storm
author: One Piece Wiki Discussion Contributors
evidence: Nero was shown to be severely wounded by multiple Shigan strikes from Lucci
He was thrown into the ocean during one of the most dangerous storms (Aqua Laguna)
No subsequent appearance or mention in the series suggests survival
CP9 had Kalifa officially write a report expelling him from the organization
counterEvidence: One Piece characters have survived seemingly impossible situations before
The manga/anime never explicitly shows his corpse or confirms his death on-screen

theory: Robin's rejection of rescue foreshadows her eventual 'I Want to Live' declaration
author: Water 7 Arc Analysis - Multiple Sources
evidence: Robin's attack on Sogeking shows her belief that pushing everyone away will protect them
Sogeking's words about having faith in Luffy visibly affect Robin, showing internal conflict
Blueno's revelation about her Ohara trauma explains her fear and self-destructive behavior
The thematic contrast between 'leave me alone' and 'I want to live' represents her character arc

theory: Lucci's statement that Robin's 'existence is a curse' directly parallels and contrasts with the eventual Tower of Justice confrontation
author: One Piece Arc Analysis
evidence: Lucci declares Robin's life has no value and she should have died as a child
This establishes the World Government's view that Robin is inherently evil
The Straw Hats' eventual declaration of war on the World Government directly refutes this ideology
Robin's 'I want to live' moment represents her choosing her own narrative over the government's condemnation
